definition: the act of starting something, serving to begin
details:
noun
- the act of starting something
= example: the act of starting something
= synonyms: start, commencement
- the first part or section of something
= example: the first part or section of something
- the event consisting of the start of something
= example: the event consisting of the start of something
- the place where something begins, where it springs into being
= example: the place where something begins, where it springs into being
= synonyms: source, origin, root, rootage
- the time at which something is supposed to begin
= synonyms: first, start, commencement, kickoff, offset, outset, get-go, starting time, showtime
adjective
- serving to begin
= synonyms: first
